items.title: Battery Data
items.subtitle:
Clear visuals and complete information about your battery.
Discover it on your settings page!

items.title: Some enhancements
items.subtitle: You will discover new things here and enhancements there like the new animation for your battery percentage, or map improvements, more is to discover!
